plugins.name: productivity-suite
plugins.description: Full bundle: 13 productivity skills — Gmail, Google Drive, Sheets, Docs, Fireflies, ClickUp, Apify, Slack, Model Scout, MD-to-PDF, YouTube Transcript, Video Understanding, and Web Fallback. Plus 2 commands: /checkpoint and /commit.

plugins.name: gmail
plugins.description: Read, search, sort, and draft emails in Gmail. No emails are sent without explicit approval.

plugins.name: google-drive
plugins.description: Upload files, search documents, and create folders in Google Drive.

plugins.name: google-sheets
plugins.description: Create spreadsheets, update rows, and append data in Google Sheets.

plugins.name: google-docs
plugins.description: Create and update Google Docs from markdown files.

plugins.name: fireflies
plugins.description: Retrieve and search meeting transcripts from Fireflies.ai.

plugins.name: clickup
plugins.description: Browse ClickUp tasks, update statuses, and read comments.

plugins.name: apify
plugins.description: Dynamic web scraping and data extraction via Apify actors.

plugins.name: slack
plugins.description: Read Slack channels and draft messages (read-only by default, no messages sent).

plugins.name: model-scout
plugins.description: Discover and compare AI models from OpenRouter by cost, speed, and capability.

plugins.name: md-to-pdf
plugins.description: Convert markdown files to clean, professional PDFs.

plugins.name: youtube-transcript
plugins.description: Extract transcripts from YouTube videos or entire channels.

plugins.name: video-understanding
plugins.description: Analyze videos using Gemini's native video understanding — summarize, document processes, extract insights.

plugins.name: web-fallback
plugins.description: Alternative web fetching via Jina Reader when standard fetching fails.
